name: Avatar Pro Bending Arena
description:
Overview

Face off in 1v1 bending fights against your friends, choosing between known characters from the series, each with their own unique play style.

Avatar Pro Bending Arena is a free-to-play fan game on the universe of Avatar: The Last Airbender and Avatar: The Legend of Korra.

This game is being worked on as part of a college project, and as such is only a demo. Full version would include more characters with different visuals, and more stages.

Controls

Player 1:

  • WASD: Move
  • T: Base attack
  • Y: Character skill

Player 2:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Numpad 5 or O: Base attack
  • Numpad 6 or P: Character skill

Instructions
Download and unzip the file, then it's ready to play.
